They will work on projects involving bioinformatics, clinical data analysis, drug discovery, genomics, medical imaging, A/B testing, and epidemiology. The candidate's primary focus will be on creating algorithms and models that are not only accurate but also transparent and compliant with data privacy regulations.

required_skills: ['DDPG', 'Inverse RL', 'Model-Based RL', 'Actor-Critic', 'Policy Gradient', 'Bellman Equation', 'Off-Policy Learning', 'Bandit Algorithms', 'Unity ML-Agents', 'OpenAI Gym']
job_llm_output: As a Reinforcement Learning Engineer, the candidate will be responsible for designing, implementing, and optimizing advanced reinforcement learning algorithms such as DDPG, Inverse RL, Model-Based RL, and Actor-Critic methods. They will work on developing policies for complex decision-making tasks using Policy Gradient and Bellman Equation techniques. Additionally, the candidate will focus on creating and testing reinforcement learning models using popular platforms like Unity ML-Agents and OpenAI Gym, with the aim of improving the efficiency and performance of these models through off-policy learning and bandit algorithms.

required_skills: ['Motion Planning', 'Path Planning', 'MuJoCo', 'V-REP', 'Manipulation', 'Trajectory Optimization', 'State Estimation', 'Sensor Fusion', 'ROS', 'Localization']
job_llm_output: As a Robotics Engineer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing advanced motion and path planning algorithms for robotic systems. Your primary focus will be on developing robust solutions for manipulation, trajectory optimization, and state estimation using tools such as MuJoCo, V-REP, and ROS. Additionally, you will work on integrating sensor fusion and localization techniques to enable autonomous navigation and interaction with the environment.

required_skills: ['Object Detection', 'Facial Recognition', 'R-CNN', '3D Vision', 'VAE', 'EfficientNet', 'SLAM', 'OCR', 'Image Segmentation', 'Stereo Vision']
job_llm_output: As a Computer Vision Engineer, the candidate will be responsible for designing and implementing advanced algorithms for object detection, facial recognition, and image segmentation using techniques such as R-CNN, EfficientNet, and VAE. They will also work on developing 3D vision systems, utilizing SLAM and stereo vision, and integrating OCR and text recognition to enhance the functionality of our products. Furthermore, the candidate will collaborate with the team to improve the overall performance and efficiency of our systems.

required_skills: ['Reward Shaping', 'Exploration Strategies', 'Temporal Difference', 'DDPG', 'Actor-Critic', 'Multi-Agent RL', 'Markov Decision Process', 'Unity ML-Agents', 'SAC', 'Inverse RL']
job_llm_output: As a Reinforcement Learning Engineer, the candidate will be responsible for designing and implementing advanced reinforcement learning algorithms to optimize the performance of AI agents in complex environments. This will involve developing exploration strategies, shaping rewards, and utilizing techniques such as Temporal Difference, DDPG, and Actor-Critic methods. The candidate will also work on implementing multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms, inverse reinforcement learning, and applying these techniques in the Unity ML-Agents platform, as well as experimenting with newer methods like SAC. The ultimate goal is to create intelligent AI agents that can learn and make decisions effectively in dynamic and unpredictable environments.

required_skills: ['Control Systems', 'Trajectory Optimization', 'State Estimation', 'Inverse Kinematics', 'Path Planning', 'PID Control', 'Computer Vision for Robotics', 'Kalman Filters', 'Gazebo Simulation', 'Localization']
job_llm_output: As a Robotics Engineer, the candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing control systems for our advanced robotic platforms.
